scripts.dev: cross-env NODE_ENV=development concurrently "webpack --config webpack.main.js --watch --mode development" "webpack --config webpack.renderer.js --watch --mode development" "webpack --config webpack.preload.js --watch --mode development" "wait-on dist/main.js && electron ."
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production webpack --config webpack.main.js --mode production && webpack --config webpack.renderer.js --mode production && webpack --config webpack.preload.js --mode production
